channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1141; 04:17PM; 3935 N Witzel Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VTLYDB; #ShermanOaks; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 28 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in the attic and wall space adjacent to the fireplace/chimney of a 3,397 square foot two story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 E102 E239 E278 E288 E99 RA878 RA99 T39 T78 T88; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1141; 03:49PM; 3935 N Witzel Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VTLYDB; #ShermanOaks; PRELIM: Two story home with fire in the attic and concealed wall space adjacent to fireplace / chimney.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 E102 E239 E278 E288 E99 RA878 RA99 T39 T78 T88; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Physical Rescue; INC#1761; 09:30PM; 5270 S Figueroa St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q1umSB; #Vermont-#Slauson; Firefighters responded to a two-vehicle traffic collision with two people trapped (and one additional not trapped). Crews used hydraulic rescue tools to roll back the wreckage and make access the patients. Sadly, one was found to be deceased. The other two were transported to the hospital via LAFD ambulance (approx 20-year-old male in serious-to-critical condition, and approx 5-year-old male in moderate condition). LAPD Inc #5012. Nothing further.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E266 E33 E46 E66 EM11 HR3 RA21 RA246 RA257 RA266 T66; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:33AM; 650 W 111th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43XQO52; #VermontVista; Firefighters responded to a one-story home with smoke showing. They made access through the front door and found two people inside, as flames grew in one room to the rear of the structure. Firefighters rescued both adult occupants from the structure, who thankfully sustained only minor smoke inhalation before being pulled out. It took 33 firefighters 13 minutes to extinguish the flames, limiting the fire damage to just one room and part of the hallway. LAFD ambulances transported both patients to a nearby hospital. Cause under investigation.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 E79 EM13 RA264 RA64 RA65 SO1 T33 T64; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0422; 08:20AM; 650 W 111th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/4awb543; #VermontVista; One-story single-family home with moderate smoke showing, and reports of patients inside. Offensive mode.; FS 64; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E57 E64 E65 E79 RA264 RA64 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire 04/10/2024 INC#1759

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1759; 09:36PM; 336 W 50th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xwVQZV; #SouthPark; Firefighters successfully protected (2) two-story fourplexes from the burning row of at least four garages in the backForty-nine firefighters deployed hose lines and prioritized defending all nearby structures. It took 27 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM20 CM22 E15 E21 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 EM11 RA21 RA66 RA846 SO1 SQ21 T21 T33 T66; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1759; 09:09PM; 336 W 50th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xwVQZV; #SouthPark; A row of garages (at least 4) with heavy fire showing, behind two residential (two-story) fourplexes.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E21 E221 E233 E33 E46 RA66 RA846 SQ21 T21 T33; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1268; 04:17PM; 7510 N Craner Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xFR6RF; #SunValley; Firefighters responded to a structure fire in a one-story home in Sun Valley. Crews quickly extended hose lines into the structure and battled flames to the rear of the building. There were 30 firefighters on scene who extinguished the flames in 13 minutes. During the course of the firefighting operations, one person was found deceased inside the home. Firefighters are performing an extensive search of the burned home to check for additional occupants. The cause of the fire is under investigation. MEDIA: PIO Captain Adam Van Gerpen is en route, ETA 5:00pm. LAPD Inc #3583. ; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AR1 BC12 BC14 E260 E289 E60 E77 E89 RA889 RA97 RA98 SO1 T60 T89; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1268; 04:04PM; 7510 N Craner Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xFR6RF; #SunValley; PRELIM: One-story single-family home with fire in the rear of the structure. Offensive mode.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; BC12 BC14 E260 E289 E60 E77 E89 RA889 RA97 RA98 T60 T89; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0695; 11:03AM; 22600 Jeffrey Mark Ct; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TR6PVv; #Chatsworth; *Address is approximate (nearest street)* Firefighters located one adult female in a remote location in need of assistance (unknown injury or medical problem) and unable to hike out on her own. LAFD Air Operations hoisted the patient and transported her to a local hospital by air. Nothing further.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E107 E296 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA896 RA96 RH114 T96; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
